title: Gorilla Carts GOR400-COM Steel Garden Cart, Steel Mesh Removable Sides, 3 cu ft, 400 lb Capacity, Green
descriptions:
Introducing the Gorilla Carts GOR400-COM Steel Garden Cart! This durable and versatile cart is perfect for all your gardening and landscaping needs. 

The frame of this cart is made from sturdy steel mesh, ensuring its durability and long-lasting performance. The quick assembly feature allows you to set up the cart in no time, so you can get to work right away. The side panels are removable, giving you the flexibility to customize the cart based on your needs.

One of the standout features of this cart is its convertibility. It can easily transform into a flatbed cart, providing you with even more hauling options. The 10-inch pneumatic tires ensure smooth and effortless maneuverability, while the tight turn radius allows you to navigate easily through tight spaces. The ample ground clearance ensures that the cart can handle various terrains with ease.

With its 4-wheel design, this cart offers excellent stability and balance, making it ideal for transporting heavy items. It has a generous weight capacity of 400 lb, allowing you to transport all your gardening tools, soil, plants, and more. The bed dimensions of 34 inches in length and 18 inches in width provide plenty of space for your items.

The straight pull handle makes it easy to maneuver and control the cart, providing you with a comfortable grip. The cart comes with a 1-year limited warranty, giving you peace of mind with your purchase.

With an overall height of 37 inches and weighing only 36.6 pounds, this cart is lightweight and easy to transport and store. Its vibrant green color adds a touch of style to your gardening routine.

Upgrade your gardening experience with the Gorilla Carts GOR400-COM Steel Garden Cart. Order yours now and enjoy the convenience and versatility it offers!
